advisories: Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References
releaseNotes:
It’s TENS across the board for version 9.10 of Howbout!
We’re introducing the next of our redesigns - the settings page is now looking cleaner and is easier to navigate! 
And we’ve also made some performance changes to the chats page, so you can message your friends to tell them how nice the new settings page looks at rapid speeds.
description:
We’re Howbout, the social calendar app to share time with friends. Share calendars, see when friends are free, make plans, keep on top of everything going on.

Over 3 million users on Howbout, and they’re all hot.

…

SHARE CALENDARS
- Want to stalk what your friends are up to? Shared calendars were made for you

MAKE PLANS
- Actually get plans out of the group chat and stop the bed rot. Unless you’re scheduling time to group bed rot together

SEE WHEN EVERYONE’S FREE
- Share your availability to find when everyone’s free to meet up without sharing every detail (boring, but necessary)

VOTE WITH POLLS
- Vote on anything (like what to do or when works best) with polls

COUNTDOWN TO PLANS
- Pin calendar events to your home screen and countdown to their date

KEEP MEMORIES
- Add pictures to pinned events to keep them as memories

ALL YOUR PLANS TOGETHER
- Forced to use a different calendar for work? Gross. Sync it all into Howbout

BUCKET LISTS
- Add in your bucket list and turn them into plans

CHAT ON EVERY PLAN
- For my yappers, there’s a built-in group chat for every plan and group

SHARE PICS & VIDS
- Share pictures & videos directly to the plan

SEND INVITES
- Invite anyone to any plan with a link - and welcome to the 21st-century

Featured by Apple, BBC, MailOnline, TechRound and a ton of other ones we don’t care about as much!

…

Bored of stalking your friend’s calendars? Stalk us instead:
@howbout_app on socials, hello@howbout.app on emailWe’re Howbout, the social calendar app to share time with friends. Share calendars, see when friends are free, make plans, keep on top of everything going on.
